data.comment: The match is underway at Estadio Azteca.
Guadalajara's Uriel Antuna misses with an attempt on goal.
In the minute 1, America have a goal kick.
Free kick for Guadalajara in the half of America.
Uriel Antuna is writhing in pain and play has been suspended for a few moments.
In the minute 4, Uriel Antuna is back on his feet again.
Goal kick for Guadalajara at Estadio Azteca.
Corner awarded to Guadalajara.
In the minute 6, Guadalajara attack but Jesus Molina's header doesn't find the target.
Jorge Perez awards America a goal kick.
Jorge Perez signals a free kick to Guadalajara in their own half.
In the minute 7, America awarded a free kick in their own half.
Giovani Dos Santos of America smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 10, Ball safe as America is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Can Guadalajara get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in America's half?
In Mexico City a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 12, Guadalajara have been awarded a corner by Jorge Perez.
Free kick for America in their own half.
Jorge Perez signals a free kick to Guadalajara.
In the minute 12, Guadalajara's Cristian Calderon is on target but unsuccessful.
Throw-in for America in the half of Guadalajara.
Throw-in for America at Estadio Azteca.
In the minute 14, Free kick for America in their own half.
Throw-in Guadalajara.
Jorge Perez signals a free kick to Guadalajara in their own half.
In the minute 16, Guadalajara awarded a free kick in their own half.
Jorge Perez awards the home team a throw-in.
Jorge Perez signals a free kick to Guadalajara in their own half.
In the minute 20, It's a goal kick for the away team in Mexico City.
Guadalajara awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Guadalajara to take a throw-in in America territory.
In the minute 23, Jorge Perez signals a America throw-in in Guadalajara's half.
Federico Vinas (America) gets up for a header but cannot keep the ball on target.
Ball goes out of play for a Guadalajara goal kick.
In the minute 25, Free kick for Guadalajara in their own half.
Free kick Guadalajara.
Henry Martin (America) is first to the ball but his header is off-target.
In the minute 29, It's a goal kick for the away team in Mexico City.
Throw-in for Guadalajara in their own half.
Throw-in for America at Estadio Azteca.
In the minute 31, Goal! Cristian Calderon gives Guadalajara a 0-1 lead.
Throw-in high up the field for America in Mexico City.
Jorge Perez signals a throw-in for America, close to Guadalajara's area.
In the minute 33, Ball safe as Guadalajara is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Corner awarded to America.
Ball goes out of play for a America goal kick.
In the minute 38, Guadalajara have been awarded a corner by Jorge Perez.
America awarded a free kick in their own half.
Goal kick for Guadalajara at Estadio Azteca.
In the minute 39, Throw-in for Guadalajara in their own half.
America have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 41, Guadalajara needs to be cautious. America have an attacking throw-in.
America make their first substitution with Nicolas Benedetti replacing Richard Sanchez.
America have been awarded a corner by Jorge Perez.
America surge into the attack at Estadio Azteca but Sebastian Caceresâ€™s header is off-target.
In the minute 42, Guadalajara have a goal kick.
Guadalajara awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in America.
In the minute 44, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Guadalajara awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Oribe Peralta of Guadalajara gets in a strike, but is off target.
In the minute 45, Jorge Perez awards America a goal kick.
The fourth official's board shows 2 minutes, which will be added to the 1st half.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Mexico City.
In the minute 45, Guadalajara will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from America.
In the minute 45, Guadalajara have a goal kick.
The first-half is over.
Hiram Mier for Guadalajara has been booked by Jorge Perez and receives a first yellow card.
Federico Vinas is down and play has been interrupted for a few moments.
The second-half is now underway.
In the minute 46, Federico Vinas returns to the field for America after picking up a slight injury.
Guadalajara are pushing forward but Cristian Calderon's finish is wide of the goal.
Goal kick for America at Estadio Azteca.
In the minute 48, Free kick for America in the half of Guadalajara.
Giovani Dos Santos (America) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Can America capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Guadalajara's half?
In the minute 52, Corner awarded to America.
America have been awarded a corner by Jorge Perez.
Can America get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Guadalajara's half?
In the minute 54, Jorge Perez awards the home team a throw-in.
Jorge Perez awards the home team a throw-in.
Corner awarded to America.
In the minute 57, Jorge Perez signals a free kick to Guadalajara in their own half.
Free kick for America in their own half.
Jorge Perez signals a free kick to Guadalajara in their own half.
In the minute 59, Throw-in for Guadalajara close to the penalty box.
Guadalajara have been awarded a corner by Jorge Perez.
Guadalajara's Hiram Mier breaks free at Estadio Azteca. But the strike goes wide of the post.
In the minute 60, Ball goes out of play for a America goal kick.
Free kick for Guadalajara in their own half.
In the minute 61, America awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Sergio Diaz is replacing Giovani Dos Santos for the home team.
Jorge Perez signals a America throw-in in Guadalajara's half.
Jorge Perez awards America a goal kick.
In the minute 63, America have a dangerous throw-in.
America needs to be cautious. Guadalajara have an attacking throw-in.
Throw-in America.
In the minute 66, Guadalajara awarded a free kick in their own half.
Jorge Perez signals a free kick to America.
In the minute 67, Throw-in for America in the half of Guadalajara.
The home team have replaced Emanuel Aguilera with Emilio Sanchez. This is the third substitution made today by Miguel Herrera.
Corner awarded to Guadalajara.
In the minute 69, Hiram Mier for Guadalajara gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Goal kick for America at Estadio Azteca.
The away team replace Oribe Peralta with Antonio Briseno.
America to take a throw-in in Guadalajara territory.
In the minute 71, Corner awarded to America.
Cristian Calderon puts the ball in the net and the away team extend their lead. The score-line now reads 0-2.
Can America get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Guadalajara's half?
In the minute 75, Goal! America reduce the deficit to 1-2 through Henry Martin.
America awarded a free kick in their own half.
America have been awarded a corner by Jorge Perez.
In the minute 79, Jorge Perez signals a America throw-in in Guadalajara's half.
Free kick for Guadalajara in their own half.
Ball goes out of play for a Guadalajara goal kick.
In the minute 81, Ronaldo Cisneros is on a sub for Uriel Antuna for Guadalajara.
Victor Vucetich is making the team's third substitution at Estadio Azteca with Fernando Beltran replacing Cristian Calderon.
Jorge Perez signals a free kick to America in their own half.
In the minute 82, Isaac Brizuela (Guadalajara) has received a yellow card from Jorge Perez.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Mexico City.
Jorge Perez awards Guadalajara a goal kick.
In the minute 86, Corner awarded to Guadalajara.
Free kick for America in their own half.
Throw-in high up the field for America in Mexico City.
In the minute 88, Jorge Perez signals a free kick to Guadalajara in their own half.
Guadalajara awarded a free kick in their own half.
At Estadio Azteca, Santiago Caseres has been yellow-carded for the home team.
Ball safe as Guadalajara is awarded a throw-in in their half.
4 minutes will be added to the 2nd half.
Throw-in for America at Estadio Azteca.
Guadalajara have a goal kick.
Jorge Perez signals a free kick to Guadalajara in their own half.
Throw-in for Guadalajara in the half of America.
America awarded a free kick in their own half.
The match has come to a close in Mexico City. The final score is 1-2.
Adrian Villalobos is replacing Isaac Brizuela for Guadalajara at Estadio Azteca.
Guadalajara's Gilberto Sepulveda Lopez has been booked in Mexico City.
